# Blessed Aim (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 50 ft.

**Effect:** 50-ft.-radius spread centered on you

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 31

*With the blessing of your deity, you bolster your alliesâ€™ aim with an exhortation.*

This spell grants your allies within the spread a +2 morale bonus on ranged attack rolls.
